full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
### [English Title]### [French Title]
**NPP – S4841490 - THS SA - One (1) Special Advisor. Temporary Help Services against the Supply Arrangement for the National Capital Region (NCR).**
**Avis de proposition officiel (APM) - S4841490 - AMA SAT - Un (1) Conseiller spécial. Les services d'aide temporaire dans le cadre de l’arrangement en matière d'approvisionnement pour la région de la capitale nationale.**


#### Solicitation Details

*   **Solicitation Number:** S4841490
*   **Title:** Temporary Help Services - Special Advisor
*   **Procurement Category:** SRV
*   **Notice Type:** RFP against Supply Arrangement
*   **Country:** Canada
*   **Language of Tender:** English/French
*   **Region:** National Capital Region (NCR)
*   **Delivery Region:** National Capital Region (NCR)

#### Tender Status and Information

*   **Reference Number:** cb-713-39123813
*   **Publication Date:** April 19, 2024
*   **Tender Closing Date:** April 25, 2024 14:00:00
*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective Tendering
*   **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
*   **Gained:** Department of National Defense
*   **Supporting Entity:** Department of National Defense

#### Note

Please note that this tender announcement has expired. For further details, please refer to the provided tender package.

#### How to Purchase

To purchase a copy of the solicitation, please refer to the Government Electronic Tender Publication (Gets) and click on the store option and search for the tender number S4841490, then below the category is the tender package and from there you can purchase a download link postal mail
here for your access term according to your network.


**Additional Resource**

*   Tender package
*   #https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/36429/s4841490--rfp.pdf
*   Royal defence ministry documentation about the tender package.  #https://www.rmc.ca/sites/default/files/tender-package.docx
